messages.message:
@Jessica or @Eric Han (?) I’m on my local instabase which should be same as master from earlier this morning, i copy pasted a flow, changed the OCR type in Process Files, then changed OCR config and save it. when I open Process Files settings again, nothing changed in the OCR config (it’s still what it was before). Reproduced on dogfood: https://dogfood.instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/felicia/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/Scan%20Box%20Cross%20Testing/flows_abbyy/process_and_map_limited_settings_abbyy.ibflow#

I’m not sure if this is an instabase quirk (but it actually works under the hood) or if this is a bug. If this is a bug I can create a JIRA ticket
or does it auto-add some settings for abbyy?

it also does this for marx, it’s these two settings:

`"produce_metadata_list":true,"produce_word_metadata":true`

@dlluncor do you know what could be going on here? I'm not familiar with how the flow file type is saved, but this seems more likely to be backend or frontend.

(once Paul joins, directing these sorts of questions will be much easier!! :tada: )

@Felicia Sorry i was in the middle of something else when i saw this question and forgot to come back and answer. Those two fields are what’s necessary for provenance and above the config there’s a ‘Allow confidence tracking’ selector. This selector overwrites these two settings. Other than these, it shouldnt change anything else you’ve manually changed.
Oops for some reason I was thinking that Eric was just going marketplace + refiner now :woman-facepalming:
Eric will be Marketplace + Flow. But we'll figure out a good path for Refiner frontend with Lydia
